Меня зовут Слава, я живу в России, в городе Омске. Я очень люблю узнавать новое о разных странах, культурах и языках, а также люблю делиться своими знаниями. Я могу поговорить с вами на разные темы и рассказать много интересного о жизни в России и не только. 

Hello! :) 
My name is Slava and I live in Russia, in the city of Omsk. I love learning something new about different countries, cultures and languages, I love sharing my knowledge as well. We can talk about many different things and I can tell you many interesting facts about living in Russia.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Сейчас я учусь в Омском Педагогическом Университете на факультете иностранных языков. Я ещё не получил диплом, но мои знания уже помогают мне в преподавании языков. Я люблю использовать разные учебные материалы на своих уроках. Я уже помог многим моим друзьям улучшить их русский язык, и я был бы очень рад помочь и вам!

Currently, I`m studying at the Omsk State Pedagogical University at the foreign languages faculty. I haven`t got my diploma yet, but I`ve already acquired a lot of knowledge which I use to improve my lessons. I love using different kinds of teaching materials at my lessons. I`ve already helped my friends to boost their Russian and I`d be really glad to help you too!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Я считаю, что очень важно находить персональный подход к каждому студенту, поэтому я буду стараться проводить уроки так, как хотите именно вы. Напишите мне какие у вас цели и я подберу учебную программу лично для вас! 

I believe that it`s important to make lessons personalized, that`s why I`ll try to make my lessons the way you want.
Write me what are your language goals and I`ll make a studying program personally for you!

course_info.trial_description:
Пробный урок- это отличный способ познакомиться. На уроке мы сможем поговорить о русском языке и том как сделать процесс обучения эффективным. Я смогу узнать ваши цели и дать вам некоторые советы по освоению русского. 

Trial lesson is a great opportunity to get known each other. At the lesson we can talk about the Russian language and and how to make the process of studying it more efficient. It will help me to understand your language goals and give you some tips about improving your Russian.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation Practice
pro_course_detail.description:
Этот урок идеально подходит вам, если вы любите интересные беседы и хотите практиковать русский язык. Вы узнаете много интересных особенностей настоящей русской речи, пополните свой словарный запас и будете гораздо более уверенно говорить по-русски :)
Напишите мне какие темы для обсуждения вас интересуют и я с радостью подберу материалы для нашей встречи. 

This lesson is for you if you are fond of interesting conversations and if you want to practice Russian. At my lessons you`ll find out many interesting features about the real Russian language, you`ll enlarge your vocabulary and of course you`ll feel more confident speaking Russian :)
Please, don`t hesitate to send me a message and describe what topics you`re interested in to discuss and I`ll prepare all the necessary materials for these topics.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
Этот курс подходит для тех, кто только начал изучать русский язык. Вместе мы освоим базовую грамматику, узнаем самые необходимые слова, поставим правильное произношение, научимся читать и писать. 

This course is for those who recently started learning Russian. Together we will master the basic grammar and vocabulary, I`ll teach you how to pronounce words correctly, you`ll be able to read and write in Russian.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian slang
pro_course_detail.description:
Русский язык невероятно богат на сленговые выражения. Это очень интересный и веселый курс для тех, кто хочет узнать, как по-настоящему выражаются русские люди и в чем заключается главная особенность русского сленга. 

The Russian language has lots of peculiar slang expressions. This is a very interesting and funny course for those who`d like to know how russian people really talk to each other and what is the main peculiarity of the russian slang.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
- У меня почти два года опыта преподавания онлайн и обучение учеников с более чем 30 разных стран
- Я сама выучила английский и немецкий с нуля
- Я знаю много методик изучения языков, которые мы могли бы применить.

- I taught myself English and German on ITalki
- I know a lot of language learning techniques that we could apply.

teacher_info.teaching_style:
Главное - общение.Я буду объяснять тебе грамматику и все, что ты не понимаешь.Но мы должны максимально много говорить.Я буду скидывать тебе интересные видео и книги, чтобы ты мог улучшать свой иностранный язык.Я готовлюсь ко всем урокам,читаю статьи,подбираю упражнения индивидуально для каждого. 
Твоя мотивация+наша совместная работа = улучшение твоего языкового уровня
The main thing is communication. I'll explain grammar to you and everything you don't understand. But we need to talk as much as possible. I will send you interesting videos and books so that you can improve your foreign language. I prepare for each lesson, read articles, look for books, select exercises individually for each.

course_info.trial_description:
Я являюсь носителем русского и украинского языка. Мы можем обсудить любую тему, начиная от природы и заканчивая ремонтом машины (а почему бы и нет?). Я помогу тебе с произношением и в конце урока расскажу о твоих ошибках и как их избежать. 
Я очень люблю узнавать о других культурах, поэтому мне будет интересно узнать о твоей стране или о твоих увлечениях. 
Так же после урока я предоставлю тебе свои советы по поводу твоего обучения
Можешь задавать мне любые вопросы. Жду нашей встречи!

I am a native speaker of Russian and Ukrainian. We can discuss any topic, from nature to car repair (why not?). I will help you with pronunciation and at the end of the lesson I will tell you about your mistakes and how to avoid them.
See you soon

pro_course_detail.title: Общий разговор, уровень B1-C2. Just a conversation
pro_course_detail.description:
Привет привет, мой будущий друг! Давай поговорим? О чем? Да не важно. Важно то, что общение поднимет твой уровень русского языка и улучшит настроение :) Разговор может состояться на любую тему. Мы можем углубиться в грамматику, произношение или какую-то сферу. 
Я могла бы предложить тебе тему для разговора, если тебе сложно выбрать. Так же, мы можем обсудить статью, книгу или последние новости. И да, мне не сложно будет изучить эту тему для тебя перед уроком. 
Моя цель - развить в тебе навыки свободного общения, без боязни; увеличить твой словарный запас и улучшить грамматику. 
Увидимся)

Hello hello my future friend! Let's talk? About what? So it doesn't matter. The important thing is that communication will raise your level of Russian and improve your mood :) A conversation can take place on any topic. We can go deeper into grammar, pronunciation, or some area.
I could suggest you a topic for conversation if you find it difficult to choose. Also, we can discuss an article, book or the latest news. And yes, it will not be difficult for me to study this topic for you before the lesson.
My goal is to develop in you the skills of free communication, without fear; increase your vocabulary and improve your grammar.
See you)

pro_course_detail.title: Грамматика и слова, любой уровень русского/ Grammar and vocabulary of any level of Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
Занятия с материалами любого уровня, помощь и объяснение грамматики, работа с лексикой и учебниками. 
Я буду подготавливать для вас уроки в виде презентаций, а так же домашние задания, если вы хотите. Поддержка в обучении и повторение каждую неделю.

Classes with materials of any level, help and explanation of grammar, work with vocabulary and textbooks.
I will prepare lessons for you in the form of presentations, as well as homework if you want. Learning support and revision every week.

Привіт друже! Як давно ти обговорював останні новини українською чи можливо ділився своїми думками на рахунок прочитаної книги? Можливо спробуємо? Це буде бесіда на будь-яку тему українською. Вивчення граматики, літератури або обговорювання новин. 
Буду рада допомогти тобі!
До зустрічи

Hello Friend! How long have you been discussing the latest news in Ukrainian or perhaps sharing your thoughts on the book you read? Maybe try? It will be a conversation on any topic in Ukrainian. Study grammar, literature or discuss news.
I will be glad to help you!
See you

Я буду стараться подстраиваться под ваш стиль изучения. Так же у меня есть много интересных упражнений и домашних заданий, если вы заинтересованы в том, чтобы материал лучше усвоился

Hello friend! Do you want to know why Russians congratulate each other on getting out of the shower and sit on suitcases before the trip? Then let's study. I can help you with learning Russian from the first steps: the alphabet, pronunciation and simple words. I prepare for every lesson, I make presentations, I have good books. I will try to adapt to your study style. I also have a lot of interesting exercises and homework if you are interested in learning the material better.
See you soon!

teacher_info.intro:
Hi everyone! 
My name is Andrey. I am a Russian native speaker willing to help you with this beautiful language. I have a Master's degree in International Relations so you can imagine I love languages and different cultures.
teacher_info.introduction:
Hello everyone! My name is Andrey. I am a Russian native who wants to help you with this beautiful language. I have a Bachelor degree in International Relations so you can imagine I love languages and different cultures. I have been teaching for more than one year now and I really like it. Here are some questions&answers; on my teaching style:
1.«What level of Russian do I have to have to take a session with you?».
You can be a beginner or an advanced learner. I have experience of teaching Russian to students of different levels. Some of them didn't even know alphabet, but some of them were already able to discuss difficult topics.
2.«What are we going to do during a lesson?»
 It depends on your level and needs. You can tell me in advance what you want to focus on. Usually I have three types of sessions: (1) SPEAKING. We just speak and discuss everything we want. I make you speak a lot and you will definitely improve your language. I guarantee. (2) DISCUSSING MOVIE OR TV SHOW. You and I chose tv show or movie, watch it BEFORE a session and then discuss it. (3) DOING DIFFERENT EXERCISES. During this type of session we will play games to build your vocabulary or do some grammar tests. 
3.«Can we reschedule our session?»
I am very flexible about rescheduling sessions. Just drop me a message and let me know that you want to speak another day.
4.« Can you use English or another languages during our session?»
 I encourage you to speak more and more Russian so that you can feel this language. I have a good command of English and French so I can use it during our sessions if you want and if there is something really difficult to explain, but I am very patient and just rephrase sentences  so that you can understand it.
5.«What about your timetable?»
I have a lot of time now, so it's my full time activity this moment. If you want me to add other hours please let me know. I can do it as well.
Thank you for your attention!
teacher_info.about_me:
Hi everyone!

So just consider me as a friend you can share everything with:)

teacher_info.intro: Hello everyone! I'm Julia. I'm a certified Russian teacher from Russia. Now I'm living in Italy and working online. I'm a native Russian speaker.
teacher_info.about_me: Hello everyone! I'm Julia. I'm a certified Russian teacher from Russia. Now I'm living in Italy and working online. I'm a native Russian speaker.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I'm certified Russian teacher with master's degree in Teaching Russian as a foreign language . I have 6 years working experience.
I have been worked for 5 years in different Chinese and Russian universities as a Russian teacher for foreigners . 
I taught the Russian language to students from different countries of different ages: China, USA, France, Italy, Korea, Japan etc. Cause of covid- 19 started working online.
 I work with different age categories (children 5+, pupils, students,  40+).
I prepare students for passing the Test of Russian as a Foreign Language (TORFL).
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I create an individual online-program for each student. I prepare individual plans to build on the listening, speaking, reading, writing and grammar - based on your needs.
In terms of methods, I use a communicative method. I try to get my students to speak more, even when we study grammar. Therefore, all tasks are structured to help you to speak. I provide all the necessary materials for my students. My aim is to provide interesting lessons, to see you improve and enjoy every lesson.
My students can always share their ideas and wishes with me regarding their education. I will help you prioritise the tasks and chose the right direction.

exp_info.description: Pаботала преподавателем на подготовительном факультете во ВГУЭСе (Владивостокский государственный университет экономики и сервиса); преподавала иностранным студентам русский язык. Обучала всем аспекта речевой деятельности: грамматика, аудирование, чтение ,письмо, устная речь. Готовила студентов к сдаче теста по русскому как иностранному (ТРКИ).

Pаботала преподавателем русского языка как иностранного в университете Beihua (北华大学), провинция Цзилинь, город Цзилинь, Китай. Обучала китайских студентов разным аспектам речевой деятельности. Знакомила с культурой и историей России.

Pаботала преподавалем русского языка как иностранного в Яньаньском университете (延安大学), провинция Шэньси, город Яньань, Китай. Обучала китайских студентов разным аспектам речевой деятельности. Знакомила с культурой и историей России. Организовывала мастер-классы, чтобы заинтересовать студентов изучать русский язык.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian
pro_course_detail.description: This is a structured course based on your level. If you want to improve your language skills, speak more confidently and clearly this course is for you. On this course we will work on all type of skills as speaking, reading, listening, writing and grammar.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation practice (Russian)
pro_course_detail.description: I know how much important it is to practice the language you are learning in a real conversation! This course is focused on conversation skills only.  Together we will compile a list of topics that we want to talk about. For every lesson I will prepare speaking exercises and vocabulary for you!

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is for students who have just started learning Russian. Grammar and speaking skills will be balanced in this course.  I will help you achieve your goal quickly and efficiently: you will be able to keep the conversation going on topics such as Family and Home, Work and Hobbies, Food and Drink, Plans and Travelling and others. Special attention is given to pronunciation.

В этом курсе уделяется сбалансированное внимание как грамматике, так и овладению разговорных навыков современного русского языка. Я помогу вам быстро и эффективно достичь цели: поддержать беседу на такие темы как Семья и Дом, Работа и Хобби, Еда и Напитки, Планы и Путешествия и другие. Особое внимание уделяется произношению.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for Children
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is for bilingual or foreign children from 6 years old. I teach children through fun activities. I will present the new material, grammar structures and their functions in context. Learning material gradually develops students language skills through captivating games, pictures and comics.
Этот курс для детей-билингвов и иностранных детей от 6 лет. На занятиях с детьми я использую коммуникативный метод обучения. Все задания построены с учётом знаний ребёнка. Ребенок осваивает язык с помощью игровых заданий, комиксов, рассказов по картинкам и т.д. Помимо учебников для детей билингвов ,
использую различные иллюстрации, картинки и мультимедийные материалы.
Для чтения подбираются детские рассказы, которые соответствуют уровню ребёнка и знакомят его с культурой России.

pro_course_detail.title: Exam Preparation (TORFL)
pro_course_detail.description: This course is for students who need to pass the TORFL exam. I prepare students for all levels exam. I will provide all necessary materials for you every lesson. On our first class we will discuss your goals and make a plan.

teacher_info.introduction:
Hello! My name is Yulia and I’m from Moscow. I’m a qualified and certified Russian teacher. I have a MA in Russian, Literature and English and a certificate in teaching Russian as a foreign language. 
I’ve been teaching for language schools, companies and private students since 2008. I’ve been teaching Russian as a foreign language for 6 years. Two years ago I started teaching online and I really enjoy it. 
I’m a patient, friendly and enthusiastic teacher.
I provide my students with all necessary materials myself. 
I usually ask my students to do some exercises for homework or, if you are short of time, revise the materials we studied in a lesson. You get your feedback within 24-hours.
I only teach adults. Most of my students are Russian language enthusiasts or business people. 
I offer:
RUSSIAN FOR BEGINNERS (A1)
-individual approach
-structured lessons for beginners  based on dialogues and short texts, covering different social situations (greetings, weather, small talk, shopping, buying tickets, eating out and etc.(grammar, vocabulary, speaking, reading, listening and writing)
-googledocs format with 24/7 access to edit, add comments and get feedback
-pronunciation tips
-homework and extra practice
RUSSIAN BASED ON YOUR NEEDS (A1-B2)
-fully based on your needs and interests. 
-structured or conversational lessons
-adopted and authentic materials
-variety of extra materials (textbooks, grammar and vocabulary books)
-homework and extra practice
RUSSIAN BASED ON A TEXTBOOK (A1-B1)
-individual approach
-lessons based on one of the course books (yours or mine)
-my own extra materials. 
-good for self-study people 
INFORMAL TUTORING
-you own materials for the lesson
-help with pronunciation/vocabulary/grammar
A more detailed description is attached to each course. 
I know how difficult the Russian language is for foreign students, but I’m sure can learn it step by step.
Thank you very much for reading my profile!
teacher_info.about_me:
I’m a qualified  and certified teacher of Russian and English from Moscow with over 10 years of experience. Also I work as a licensed Moscow tour guide which I believe is a great way enjoy the city where I live, practice the language and meet new people.
 I'm interested in reading (fiction and non-fiction), sport, fitness, travelling and movies.
Also I'm a fan of online courses (especially about history , literature and languages).
I live in Moscow so I try to spend my free time visiting interesting places, eating out and just walking around the city.
I really enjoy travelling to new countries, meeting new people and talking about different cultures.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have a MA in Russian, Literature and English (Moscow State Regional University 2005)
a certificate in teaching Russian as a foreign language (Moscow State University 2011)
TKT (teacher knowledge test Modules 1, 2, 3 2011)
I have been working as a teacher for almost 11 years now and I really like it.
I find it's a challenging but exciting and very rewarding job.
I teach private students  both online via Skype and offline.
I have over 5300 lessons online.
I have worked as a company teacher for Indesit, Whirlpool, GE, Otis, Toyota and others so far.
I only teach adults. Most of my students are Russian language enthusiasts or business people.
I’m a patient, friendly and enthusiastic teacher.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I offer structured lessons for A1-B1 students which may be adjusted to your needs.
Lessons are made in a Googledocs format and are available to edit, add comments and get feedback 24/7
I provide homework and extra grammar and vocabulary practice (if it's needed). You get your feedback within 24-hours.
For advanced students I prepare Conversational, Vocabulary or Grammar  lessons based on adopted and authentic materials (articles, news, audio and video programes, TV series, films) with grammar, vocabulary and written tasks.
I'm open to my students’ ideas about the materials and type of lessons they need.
Для русскоязычных, изучающих английский язык, я использую учебники британских издательств
teacher_info.cancel_policy:
I try to be as flexible as I can so even if you missed rescheduling/cancellation deadline or  if you missed a lesson due to an emergency, let me know as soon as you can and we we may be able to figure out how to reschedule it.
And I hope you understand I may not agree to reschedule a lesson if you missed a lesson at 7.00 am on Sunday morning.
Please note that I don’t always see messages as soon as they are sent, as I am often teaching other students.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners (A1)
pro_course_detail.description:
Minimum grammar & vocabulary, maximum useful phrases. 
It’s a course for those who have never learned Russian and who are short of time or too busy for a general course. It’s based on dialogues and short texts, covering different social situations such as greetings, weather, small talk, shopping, buying tickets, eating out and etc. I made most of dialogues and text myself, and I tried to make them as entertaining and useful as possible. 
After each lesson I send you a file with exercises for practice, text or dialogues used in a lesson and a wordlist.
The course consists of 26 units which take two-three lessons to complete.
It's a link to a rough plan of a course:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1mHa3oaEA3m_rJkpuy_nCSSTtJvqrww2iGKL9AuA0xSU/edit
If you are not a zero beginner and have already had some experience (self-studies, courses, private tutoring and etc.) and don't want to start form the very beinning, you can do the test and send me it for a check. I'll be able to come up with a more efficient plan for a trial/first lesson. 
it's a link to the test https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B4229NLMRFIdaEczVGZIc05YVms
I'd be appreciated if you  tried to be honest doing the test overwise  it could give me a wrong idea about your level.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian based on your needs (A1-B2)
pro_course_detail.description:
A course is fully based on your needs and interests. At first we discuss your goals and then I try to choose the best way for you to achieve them. For example, I can write dialogues or texts which include all grammar and vocabulary you need for talking about a particular subject; adopt learning materials or newspaper and magazine articles for you to discuss.
I usually ask all students to do a placement test and send it back to me for a check before a trial/first lesson to understand the level of passive knowledge. 
These are links to tests:
A1: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1NCfsrHCe4hfcmQJg5q3TKBUNsXS05C1t/view?usp=sharing
A2:https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Hyv5lx_ReaD0TjW8Iq33k0QKjraUX2PEcbZkt6AXs64/edit?usp=sharing
B1: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1wKikiZpubsG9nk3VTzg5FNgr-eZ6ULUPt8g0EvGe77E/edit?usp=sharing

pro_course_detail.title: Informal tutoring
pro_course_detail.description: it's an informal tutoring lesson. I don't provide any matrial beforehand. In the lesson we may have a conversation practice or wok on your specific tasks or materials.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian based on a text book (A1-B1)
pro_course_detail.description:
It’s based on one of the course books with some my own extra materials. There is no need to follow the course book step by step, it can be adjusted to your needs. 
It’s a good choice for you if you are good at self-study and don’t want to be depended on one particular teacher.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I studied at Moscow State University and received a bachelor's degree in journalism. The main goals of my training were to acquire linguistic skills and refine the knowledge of my own language.

I started tutoring in my first year at the university, so I have been teaching languages for 6 years now. I consider Russian to be a very beautiful, rich and expressive language. So I do love teaching Russian and I want to help you learn it in the most effective and creative way.

I strongly believe that the teacher should use an individual approach to each student. So I usually plan my lessons depending on my students` needs and their language levels.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
In the first lesson, we will discuss your goals and expectations from our classes to determine your personal strategy of learning.
We can concentrate on speaking practice and talk about everything you`re interested in. I will help you to improve your grammar and pronunciation as well as expand your vocabulary.
If you are at the very beginning of the study, I will help you not to get lost in the huge volume of new words and constructions, but to follow a clear and effective plan.
If you have already achieved success in learning the Russian language, we can focus on certain aspects. I will assist you with improving your writing, reading or listening skills. 
I look forward to seeing you!

pro_course_detail.description:
This course is fully based on your needs and your language level. If you are at the very beginning of the study, I will help you not to get lost in the huge volume of new words, phrases and constructions, but to follow a clear and effective plan, gradually increasing your knowledge.
If you have already achieved success in learning the Russian language, we can focus on certain aspects. I will assist you with improving your writing, reading or listening skills. I will also provide you with interesting and useful materials to make learning more fascinating and efficient. 
I will be glad to see you in my class!

pro_course_detail.title: General
pro_course_detail.description:
Welcome to Tajik class! This is the general class for students to take.

This class is not very formal, but it is effective. I won’t give you useless activities or waste your time. Only what you need. You’re going to speak, and speak a lot!

As we continue, you’ll be able to see your improvement. I’ll give you a lot of time to talk, and I’ll be listening for errors. The most important job I have is to correct your errors, and show you why they’re wrong. I’m dedicated to making sure your Tajik is the same as mine, as native as possible.

In this class I use grammar books, pictures, articles, lists, and many more materials to help you understand the best way possible.

Let’s learn together! I’m looking forward to building our Tajik relationship.

pro_course_detail.title: Общий Курс Русского языка \\ General Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
[RU|EN]

Общий курс позволяет ученикам получить все навыки языка -- начиная от навыка разговора и восприятия на слух до написания эссе и грамматики. Курс подразумевает использование аутентичных материалов и большого количества разговорной практики.
Общий курс также предоставляет гибкость. Мы сможем больше внимания обращать именно на те навыки, которые будут нужны именно Вам!

Курс проводится на русском языке (с использованием английского как вспомогательного). Не бойтесь, это не будет сложно, но будет весело и полезно для прогресса :)

Материалы: Сертифицированные учебники, изображения, аудио, видеозаписи, статьи и проч.

\\

The General course provides the opportunity to improve all aspects of language -- from Speaking and Listening to Writing and Grammar. The course utilizes authentic materials and puts emphasis on speech practice.
The General course also allows for flexibility. We can focus on the aspects and skills which are important to you!

The course is conducted in the Russian language (using English as a secondary language if need be). Worry not -- it will not be too hard but will definitely be fun :)

Materials: approved course books, images, audio, video, articles, etc.

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорный русский \\ Conversational Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
[RU|EN]

Навыки разговора -- один из самых важных навыков и один из самых сложных для тренирования самостоятельно. На уроках разговорного русского мы сможем поговорить о самых разных вещах, окружающих нас, научиться высказывать мнение о любых предметах и событиях вокруг нас.

Ожидаемый стандарт -- от 60% до 80% времени разговора ученика.

Также мы можем адаптировать разговорный курс под определённые темы: поговорим о фильмах? Об искусстве? Возможно, о готовке? Хочешь обсудить социальные темы? Или историю? Я всегда буду рад услышать, какие темы будет интересно обсудить!

\\

Speaking skills are among the most important skills. Also they are one of the most challenging ones to practice independently. At Conversational Russian classes, we get an opportunity to speak about most different things and learn to express opinions on the most difficult issues.

The expected standard is 60% to 80% of the time being dedicated to student speaking.

We are also going to have a chance to focus on some specific topics: would you like to talk about movies? Art? Cooking, maybe? Do you want to talk about social issues? Or history? Looking forward to hearing what you would like to discuss!

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian language course. All levels.
pro_course_detail.description:
To master the language, you must be able to speak, read, write and understand by ear. These four language skills — speaking, reading, writing and listening comprehension — must be developed together to provide communicative competence. In the lessons, we will progress step by step, paying attention to each skill.
If you are a begginer we'll start with the cyrillic alphabet, you will learn rules for reading, Russian pronunciation, typical Russian intonations. In a few lessons you'll start talking about yourself in Russian and understand simple Russian texts.

Помогу заложить прочный фундамент, разобраться с грамматическими сложностями именно с точки зрения русскоговорящего человека и заговорить. Будем слушать аудио, смотреть видео, читать и, конечно, много разговаривать. Познакомимся с итальянской культурой, тонкостями итальянского менталитета, традициями и привычками итальянцев.

pro_course_detail.description:
Russian as a foreign language course -(Pre-Intermediate)-(Upper-Intermediate) - is designed for Business Russian learners worldwide.

“Russian for Business” is aimed at entrepreneurs and managers working or planning to do business with Russia, and interested in improving their communication skills in the Russian language.

The course consists of 12 units, and includes a course-book, a workbook with exercises (with keys) and Audio with listening tasks. Each unit has the following sections: vocabulary, grammar, business skills, dialogues and a case study based on a real-life business situation.

The course may be used to teach Business Russian in language schools, universities or serve as self-study reference books.

teacher_info.about_teacher: I always try to tailor the lessons to the student’s goals and interests in order to make the time in the classroom enjoyable and effective. I am happy to help you achieve your goals. We can focus on grammar, speaking skills and pronunciation, or on anything else you might want to improve. I believe language learning to be about communication, so I’d be happy to hear more about you and your interests.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I usually start each lesson with a small warmup conversation, review and then we’ll move on to the main topic of the lesson. I provide a structured course, which includes speaking, listening, reading and writing, but we can focus on the aspects that you need the most. With beginners I use a lot of drills. This helps to build up confidence and to memorize new words. With intermediate and advanced learners I prefer having guided conversation on different topics.

For Japanese language, we will start with learning hiragana, katakana, then basic vocabulary and grammar for everyday conversations. We will also work on reading and writing kanji.

exp_info.description: Подготовка и проведение индивидуальных уроков русского языка с использованием различных учебных пособий.

Подготовка и проведение личных уроков по русскому, английскому и японскому языкам.
Проведение уроков по Skype.
Устный и письменный перевод на различные тематики.

course_info.trial_description:
Let's get acquainted and discuss your preferences, aims and hardships in learning. We might also do a couple of exercises suited to your level.
I look forward to seeing you on the lesson!

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian Course
pro_course_detail.description:
This course covers all levels from beginner to advanced and includes speaking, listening, reading and per request writing. The program is based on one of the most popular and effective textbook series.

We can start from the basics so don't worry if you never studied Russian before!
Please tell me your aims and goals and I will tailor the lessons to them, so we can focus on the aspects you need the most.

I look forward to seeing you on the lesson!

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation Practice
pro_course_detail.description:
Let's discuss different topics in Russian! 
It can be any topic you are interested in or we can choose one from the list.
During the class I will correct and explain any kinds of errors, but I advise having at least A2 level grammar.

pro_course_detail.title: Japanese for beginners - Японский для начинающих
pro_course_detail.description:
I teach Japanese grammar, hiragana, katakana and kanji using Japanese textbooks and additional resources. We will learn vocabulary and structures for daily conversation: introducing yourself, interests, food, etc. We will also focus on reading and writing.
Lesson program can be changed in order to match your goals and level!

Здравствуйте! Я преподаю японский на начальном уровне. На занятиях мы разберем грамматику и лексику, необходимую для поддержания диалога на такие темы, как знакомство, хобби и интересы, еда и др. Также уделим внимание чтению и письму. 
Программу уроков возможно подкорректировать по вашему запросу.

I look forward to meeting you in the lesson! (＾▽＾)/
